entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
